XXbsu045_u:1073: [SaSū 184] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bahavo bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ bahavo bhadanta
XXbsu045_u:1074: sugataḥ sattvā rātrindivaṃ parimucyante tadadyāpi sattvānāṃ kṣayo na bhavati /
XXbsu045_u:1075: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase
XXbsu045_u:1076: śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kaścideva puruṣo bhavedāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ prabhūtabhogaḥ bahudhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamanvāgataḥ bahudāsadāsīkarmakarapauruṣeyāni cāsya syuḥ bahūni ca dhanaskandhāni bhaveyuḥ bahūni ca kṣetrārāmāṇi saṃvidyeran bahūni ca dhanadhānyāni /
XXbsu045_u:1077: tadyathā yavagodhumaśālitilamāṣamudgādīni sa ca puruṣo vasantakāle sarvāni tāni dhanadhānyāni vāpayeta /
XXbsu045_u:1078: atha yāvadapareṇa kālasamayena sarvāṇi tāni dhanadhānyāni paripadyaran sa paripakvānīti viditvā sa yāvadabhyantaragṛhe
XXbsu045_u:1079: praveśayeta; sa puruṣastāni dhanadhānyāni gṛhasyābhyantare pṛthak pṛthak
XXbsu045_u:1083: [SaSū 185] evameva bhaiṣajyasena ime sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ śubhaṃ karma kṛtvā paścāt teṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ parikṣayāt punaḥ punarapi puṇyakṣetrameṣante kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti /
XXbsu045_u:1084: kuśalamūlānyavaropayitvā tatra ca kuśaladharme pratipatya saṃpādayanti /
XXbsu045_u:1087: tena ca prītiprāmodyacittena bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi na nāśyante /
XXbsu045_u:1088: evameva bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo na kadācid vināśadharmā bhavati /
XXbsu045_u:1091: kathaṃ bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati /
XXbsu045_u:1093: bahūni bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati /
XXbsu045_u:1096: na śakyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena pāpakarmaṇā sattvena tīvraṃ duḥkhamapanayituṃ na ca pāpena svapnena dṛṣṭenāsya bhayaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu045_u:1099: bhagavān āha - agniṃ bhaiṣajyasena prajvalitaṃ paśyati /
XXbsu045_u:1100: tatra tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittaṃ utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśāni me dagdhāḥ dvitīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena udakaṃ paśyati luḍitaṃ saṃpraluḍitaṃ /
XXbsu045_u:1101: tatra tena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na bhettavyaṃ /
XXbsu045_u:1102: tatkasya hetoḥ evaṃ hi bhaiṣajyasena bodhisattvena sarvamohabandhanāni vinivartya sarvapāpakṣayaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati
XXbsu045_u:1103: / tṛtīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati
XXbsu045_u:1106: [SaSū 188] bhagavān āha - svaśarīre śīrṣaṃ muṇḍitaṃ paśyati /
XXbsu045_u:1107: tatra tena bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na bhettavyaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ rāgadveṣamohāni me muṇḍitāni bhavanti
XXbsu045_u:1108: / ṣaḍgatikaṃ ca me saṃsāraṃ parājitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu045_u:1110: na tiryakṣu na preteṣu (vā) nāsureṣu (vā) na nāgeṣu na deveṣu pariśuddheṣu bhaiṣajyasena buddhakṣetreṣu prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ upapattiṃ pratigṛhṇāti /
XXbsu045_u:1111: [SaSū 189] (bhaviṣyati) bhaiṣajyasena paścime kāle paścime samaye yadi
XXbsu045_u:1115: tatra(tena) bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na parikhedacittamutpādayitavyaṃ
XXbsu045_u:1117: [SaSū 190] bahavo bhaiṣajyasena mayā dharmā deśitāḥ mayā ca bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpaniyutaśatasahasrāni duṣkaracaryā cīrṇā na mayā bhaiṣajyasena rājyabhogārthāya vā vṛttibhogārthāya vā aiśvaryabhogārthāya vā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇāḥ svabhāvadharmāvabodhāya bhaiṣajyasena mayā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇāḥ na ca me tāvadanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā yāvanna mayāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ yasminstu bhaiṣajyasena kālasamaye mayāyaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāya śrutaḥ tatraiva me divase anuttarā
XXbsu045_u:1118: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā gaṃbhīro yaṃ bhaiṣajyasena dharmaparyāyaḥ durlabho 'sya bhaiṣajyasena dharmaparyāyasya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi śravaḥ paramadurlabho bhaiṣajyasena tathāgatānāmutpādaḥ paramadurlabhā bhaiṣajyasenāsya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaḥ
XXbsu045_u:1121: kalpaśatasahasraṃ bhaiṣajyasena sattvā saṃsārāt paścānmukhaṃ kariṣyanti /
XXbsu045_u:1126: bhavyā abhijñākuśalasthānaṃ prajñatum bhavyāḥ kuśalasthānanirodhaṃ prajñātum
XXbsu045_u:1129: artha ucyate bhagavan dharmasthānam bhagavānāha - katamaṃ bhaiṣajyasena dharmasthānaṃ /
XXbsu045_u:1135: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yas(tvaṃ)
XXbsu045_u:1138: kena kāreṇana bhagavan tathāgatā loka utpadyante /
XXbsu045_u:1139: bhagavān āha - ye bhaiṣajyasena bāhuśrutyasamanvāgamaṃ prajānanti /
XXbsu045_u:1141: te tathāgatānāmutpādaṃ jñātvā idaṃ tathāgatānāmutpādasukhasthānaṃ prajānanti /
XXbsu045_u:1142: yadā ca tathāgatā loka utpadyante tadā sattvā sarvadharmān prajānanti /
XXbsu045_u:1146: [SaSū 194] āha jñānamevaṃ jñātvā katamaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prajānanti /
XXbsu045_u:1150: bhaiṣajyasena dharmasaṃgrahaṃ prajānatāṃ prathamo lābha utpadyate /
XXbsu045_u:1152: [SaSū 195] tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kaścideva puruṣo vāṇijako bhavet sa lābhahetorgacchan parakyasvakasya suvarṇasya puruṣabhārasahasraṃ
XXbsu045_u:1153: gṛhītvā gacchet tasya gacchatastau mātāpitarāvevamāhutuḥ śṛṇu kulaputra idaṃ suvarṇasya puruṣabhārasahasraṃ gṛhītaṃ parakyasvakasya ca; ta tvayedaṃ suvarṇaṃ sugṛhītaṃ kartavyaṃ na ca kiṃcidato vināśayitavyaṃ
XXbsu045_u:1154: mahālābhaṃ kṛtvā suvarṇaṃ eva sugṛhītaṃ kuru tadasmākaṃ mahālābho bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu045_u:1155: sukhaṃ ca jīviṣyāmaḥ sa ca putrastau mātāpitarāvevaṃ vadedevaṃ kariṣyāmi /
XXbsu045_u:1156: ityuktvā sa vāṇijakaḥ suvarṇaṃ gṛhītvā gacchedatha sa vāṇijakaḥ pramādādyāvan māsamātreṇa sarvaṃ suvarṇaṃ vināśayedvilayaṃ kuryāt
XXbsu045_u:1157: [SaSū 196] atha sa puruṣaḥ paramacintāmāpannaḥ śokaśalyenāviddhahṛdayaḥ sahrīravatrāpyena ca svagṛhaṃ na paraviśeta; tasya tau mātāpitarau
XXbsu045_u:1158: śṛṇuyātāṃ evaṃ yuvābhyāṃ putreṇa tat suvarṇaṃ sarvaṃ vināśitamiti śrutvā nirāśībhūtau śokaśalyenābhyāhatahṛdayau vastrāṇi pāṭayataḥ śocataḥ krandataḥ evaṃ ca paridevataḥ duṣputro 'smākaṃ gṛhe putrarūpeṇotpannaḥ sakalaṃ eva gṛhaṃ vināśītavān asmākamanāthaṃ kṛtvā dāsau karmakarau kṛtau;
XXbsu045_u:1159: tasya tau mātāpitarau cintāparigatahṛdayau nirāśau kālagatau tatastena putreṇa śrutaṃ matāpitarau me nirāśau kālagatau; so 'pi putro nirāśa eva
XXbsu045_u:1162: ye sattvā mama śasane na prasīdanti te nirāśībhūtā maraṇakālasamaye śokaśalyābhyāhatahṛdayā mahādharmaratnabahiṣkṛtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti /
XXbsu045_u:1163: yathā tau mātāpitarau nirāśau śocataḥ paridevataḥ suvarṇahetoḥ śokaśalyābhyāhatahṛdayau parakyasvakena suvarṇena śokaśalyaparigatau cintāmāpadya kālagatauḥ
XXbsu045_u:1164: [SaSū 198] evameva bhaiṣajyasena ye mama śasane na prasīdante paścān maraṇakālasamaye paritapyamānāḥ paridevanto duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
XXbsu045_u:1165: pūrvakṛtāni ca puṇyāni paribhuktvā na bhūyo 'nyāni puṇyāni kurvanti sukṣetragatāni /
XXbsu045_u:1166: tatra teṣāṃ puṇyaparikṣīṇānāṃ śokaśalyaparigatahṛdayānāṃ tena kālena tena samayena narakatiryagyoniyamalokopapattiṃ ghorāṃ dāruṇān dṛṣṭvā maraṇakālasamaye evaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu045_u:1167: ko me trātā bhavedyadahaṃ naraka (gati) tiryakpretayamalokaviṣayaṃ na paśyeyan na ca tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayeyaṃ /
XXbsu045_u:1168: [SaSū 199] tasyaivaṃ pralapataḥ paralokamākramataḥ tau mātāpitarāvevamāhataḥ kiṃ kariṣyāma putraka; gāthābhiścāddhyābhāṣataḥ (54)
XXbsu045_u:1170: nāsti te maraṇaṃ putra glānasya maraṇādbhayaṃ /
XXbsu045_u:1171: (55) mokṣo bhaviṣyate tubhyaṃ vyādherhi bhayabhairavāt dhṛtiṃ kuruṣva he putra tataḥ siddhirbhaviṣyati
XXbsu045_u:1173: (56) niruddhyate me vijñānaṃ kāyo me pīḍyate bhṛśam sarve aṅgāni duḥkhanti mṛtyuṃ paśyāmi
XXbsu045_u:1174: (57) na paśyataścakṣuṣī me karṇau me na śṛṇonti ca /
XXbsu045_u:1175: śrotraṃ punarna lapsyāmi na kāyaḥ saṃsahiṣyati /
XXbsu045_u:1176: (58) aṅgamaṃgāni duḥkhanti kāṣṭhā iva acetanāḥ visvādayasi me amba nāgataṃ maraṇaṃ tava;
XXbsu045_u:1178: (59) vaktuṃ nārhasi putraivaṃ mā me trāsaparāṃ kuru /
XXbsu045_u:1181: (60) na paśyāmi jvaraṃ kāyerna ca vyādhirna duḥkhati /
XXbsu045_u:1182: paśyāmi maranaṃ ghoraṃ hataṃ kāyaṃ ca me bhṛśam (61) paśyāmi ātmanā sarvaṃ kāyaṃ duḥkhaprapīḍitaṃ
XXbsu045_u:1183: gacchāmi kasya śaraṇaṃ ko me trātā bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu045_u:1184: (62) mātāpitā vadet putra devakrodhaṃ hi te bhavet devebhyo yajanaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ svastirbhaviṣyati
XXbsu045_u:1187: śīghraṃ śīghraṃ ca gatvā vai pṛcchathā devapālakam
XXbsu045_u:1188: [SaSū 200] atha tasya tau mātāpitarau devakukaṃ gatvā devasya dhūpaṃ dāpayanti /
XXbsu045_u:1189: atha sa devapālakaḥ devasya dhūpaṃ datvaivaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate /
XXbsu045_u:1190: devaste kruddhaḥ devasyopakāraḥ kartavyaḥ yajanaṃ kartavyaṃ /
XXbsu045_u:1191: tatra paśurghātayitavyaḥ puruṣaśca ghātayitavyaḥ tataste putro vyādheḥ parimokṣyate /
XXbsu045_u:1192: atha tau mātāpitarau tasyām velāyāmevaṃ cintayataḥ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daridrāścāsma /
XXbsu045_u:1193: yadi devo na parasīdiṣyati tadasmākaṃ putraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyati /
XXbsu045_u:1194: atha vā prasādaṃ kuryāttadvayaṃ paramadaridrāḥ paśuṃ puruṣaṃ cānayāma /
XXbsu045_u:1195: [SaSū 201] atha tau śīghraśīghraṃ svagṛhaṃ gatvā yatkiṃcidgṛhe pariṣkāraṃ saṃvidyate tatsarvaṃ vikrīya; paśukrayārthe gacchataḥ atha tāvadanyataraṃ puruṣaṃ evaṃ vadeyuḥ dehi bhoḥ puruṣaḥ suvarṇamasmākaṃ yācitaṃ yadi śaknumo daśame divase punarapi dātuṃ tacchobhanamatha na śaknumo dātuṃ tadvayaṃ tava dāsā bhaviṣyāmaḥ karmakarāḥ tau ca taṃ suvarṇaṃ gṛhītvā gaccheyuḥ paśuṃ puruṣaṃ krotuṃ /
XXbsu045_u:1196: [SaSū 202] atha tābhyāṃ ca paśuḥ puruṣa krītaḥ sa ca puruṣo na jānīyādyan māmete jīvitādvyavaropayiṣyanti
XXbsu045_u:1197: atha tau mātāpitarau saṃmohamāpannau na bhūyaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭau /
XXbsu045_u:1200: atha tau mātāpitarau svayameva taṃ paśuṃ ghātayataḥ taṃ ca puruṣaṃ jīvitādvyavaropayataḥ tataḥ sa devapālaka ārabdho yajñaṃ yajanāya medaṃ prajvālayati /
XXbsu045_u:1203: tatastau mātāpitarau prītiprāmodyena sphuṭāvāhatuḥ varaṃ putro jīvatu vayaṃ dāsā bhaviṣyāmaḥ tatastau mātāpitarau nivartya suyaṣṭāṃ devaṃ kṛtvā yāvat svagṛhaṃ gatvā tadā taṃ putraṃ kālagataṃ paśyanti /
XXbsu045_u:1204: tatastau mātāpitarau mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena śokaśalyenāviddhahṛdayau nirāśībhūtau /
XXbsu045_u:1211: kutra bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāmupapattiḥ ko 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ āha /
XXbsu045_u:1214: pṛcchāmi bhagavan pṛcchāmi sugata; bhagavān āha /
XXbsu045_u:1215: tatra bhaiṣajyasena mātā raurave mahānarake upapannā; pitā saṃghāte mahānarake
XXbsu045_u:1216: upapannaḥ putrastapane mahānarake upapannaḥ devapālako mahāvicau mahānarake upapannaḥ
XXbsu045_u:1219: bhagavān āha - iha bhaiṣajyasenānaparādhikasya puruṣasya trāyastriṃśānan devanāṃ sahabhāvyatāyāmupapattirdraṣṭavyā; āha /
XXbsu045_u:1220: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yat sa puruṣastrāyastriṃśatā devānāṃ sahabhāvyatāyāmupapannaḥ bhagavān āha - śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena sa puruṣo maraṇakālasamaye jīvitādvyavaropyamāṇastathāgatasyopari cittaṃ prasādyaivaṃ vācamabhāṣataḥ namastasya bhagavate tathāgatasyārhataḥ
XXbsu045_u:1222: sa tena bhaiṣajyasena kuśalamūlena ṣaṣṭiḥ kalpān trāyastriṃśatāṃ devānāṃ sukhamanubhaviṣyati
XXbsu045_u:1226: na hi te sarvasattvā śakyaṃ parinirvāpayitum
XXbsu045_u:1227: [SaSū 205] evamukte bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan na śakyaṃ sarvasattvāḥ parinirvāpayitum bhagavān āha - vīryaṃ bhaiṣajyasenārabdhavyam āha katamo bhagavan vīryāraṃbhaḥ bhagavān āha /
XXbsu045_u:1239: tadyathāpi nāma kaścideva bhaiṣajyasena puruṣa vṛkṣaṃ vāpayeta /
XXbsu045_u:1240: vāpitasya vṛkṣasya tatraiva divase aṅkuraṃ viruhyeta /
XXbsu045_u:1241: yatraiva divase aṅkuraṃ viruhyanta tatraiva divase tadaṅkuraṃ yojanamadhastādgacchete; dvitīyaśca puruṣa evameva vṛkṣaṃ
XXbsu045_u:1242: vāpayeta; atha tatraivadivase vātakṣobhena tasya vṛkṣasya nāṅkurāni
XXbsu045_u:1243: viruhyeranatha sa puruṣastasmāt sthānāt taṃ vṛkṣaṃ uddharetathānyataraśca puruṣaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaṃ kuryāt kimarthaṃ me bhūmiṃ khanasīti /
XXbsu045_u:1244: [SaSū 207] tena ca kālena tena samayena rājā aśrauśīdevaṃ dvau puruṣau
XXbsu045_u:1245: parasparakalahabhaṇḍanavigrahajātau vivadataḥ tena ca rājñā tayordūtaḥ preṣitaḥ gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa tau dvau puruṣāvānaya; evaṃ deveti sa
XXbsu045_u:1246: puruṣastasya rājñaḥ pratiśrutya tvaramāṇarūpaḥ pradhātvā tau puruṣāvetadavocat - rājā yuvayorāmantrayati
XXbsu045_u:1247: atha tāvadeva tatraiva puruṣa bhītastrasta dvitīyaśca puruṣo 'bhīto 'nutrastaḥ yena sa rājā
XXbsu045_u:1248: tenopanītāvupanīya rājña purataḥ sthāpitāvatha sa rājā tayorevamāha /
XXbsu045_u:1250: [SaSū 208] atha khalu tau dvau puruṣāvutthāya taṃ rājānametadavocatāṃ śṛṇu mahārājāsmākaṃ na kiṃcit pṛthivīpradeśaḥ saṃvidyate /
XXbsu045_u:1251: yācitake pṛthivīpradeśe vṛkṣo vāpitaḥ tatraiva divase vāpitastatraiva divase 'ṅkuraṃ patrāṇi puṣpāṇi phalāṇi ca prādurbhūtāni āmārdhaṃ pakvārdhaṃ ca /
XXbsu045_u:1252: etena ca dvitīyena puruṣeṇa tatraiva divase tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe vṛkṣo vāpita /
XXbsu045_u:1254: vātena kṣubhitena na patrāṇi na puṣpāṇi na phalāni prādurbhūtāni /
XXbsu045_u:1255: na ca mahārāja yojanamadhastādasya mūlaṃ gacchati /
XXbsu045_u:1256: sa eṣa puruṣo mayā sārdhaṃ vivadati tavāparādha iti /
XXbsu045_u:1257: api (tu) ca deva svayameva parīkṣya jānīyān nātra mama kiṃcidaparādhaḥ saṃvidyate /
